channel.title: Fashion Business on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Fashion Business on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: The magical mystery tour
item.description: This weekend was a great time. I modeled in another fashion show. I don’t know if I have any pictures as yet. I hope so. I met some rather cool cats, some I hope to see again. heh. I also went to some crazy frat boy bar and had free drinks and then found the crazy new meaning to “hungry drunk.” I also fixed my direct TV. heh. however, it is still sorta wack.
